mapper.select: SELECT a.app_date, a.app_title, e.emp_name, a.app_status FROM approval a, employee e, ${table} tb WHERE e.emp_no = tb.emp_no and tb.app_no = a.app_no and tb.emp_no = #{emp_no}

SELECT app_date, app_title, emp_name, app_status FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_ASC(${table} pk_${table}) */ rownum rn, a.app_date, a.app_title, e.emp_name, a.app_status FROM approval a, employee e, ${table} tb WHERE e.emp_no = tb.emp_no and tb.app_no = a.app_no and tb.emp_no = #{emp_no} and rownum <= #{cri.pageNum} * #{cri.amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount}

SELECT a.app_no, a.app_class, a.app_title, a.app_date, a.app_status FROM approval a, employee e, ${table} tb WHERE e.emp_no = tb.emp_no and tb.app_no = a.app_no and tb.emp_no = #{emp_no} and tb.app_no = #{app_no}
